# V 0.7.0
Changes in this release:
- Various bugfixes
- Use yaml.safe_load() instead of yaml.load()

- Add unittest handlers

# V 1.0.0
Changes in this release:
- added log serialization to deploy, to better mimic agent behavior
- added dryrun
